item.description:
Run for Cover is a Great Band, I have heard them play in past,. They play for good causes- Benefits,Charities, etc. and play a mix of top 40's, also take requests. This is a five piece band.

Lets all get together to support this Great Band and DANCE. Bring your fun self to the Haluwa to meetup for good times!!

I will be there for 7:30 to get tables together for plenty of seating. We can eat Chineese food and sip on Scorpion Bowls and hang out until the band starts. The Haluwa has a great menu.

Sorry for late posting just heard about this awesome event myself!

Band plays from 9-1am

No Cover Charge

Not far from many Towns

Bring your great attitude and show it on the Dance floor!

 

You will find the meet up groups at the tables closest to the band and the waitress who know us will also  seat you.
item.name: "Run For Cover" Great Entertainment Free Admission
